resources.string: Enabling these optimization tweaks may violate the Boosteroid\'s terms of service. The developer is not responsible for any account restrictions, suspensions, or bans that may result from using these features. By proceeding, you acknowledge and accept all potential risks.
Removes streaming FPS restrictions and increases the cap to 120 FPS on supported devices
Removes default bitrate limits to use the Boosteroid\'s maximum allowed quality
Set the desired resolution for streaming. Higher values provide better image quality but require more bandwidth
Select the screen aspect ratio for streaming
Allows content to display in the screen cutout area. Disable to keep UI elements away from the notch
We\'re sorry for the inconvenience. Please restart the app or report this issue to help us fix it.

Module is currently inactive. Please either:

1. Enable it in the LSPosed/Xposed Framework settings

or

2. Patch Boosteroid application using LSPosed

for your changes to take effect.
